sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食盐，柠檬汁，孜然粉，橄榄油和胡椒粉调味。

sentences.english: Dry fry the cumin and coriander seeds, then grind them into a powder using a pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 干炒孜然和芫荽籽，然后用杵和臼磨成碎末。

sentences.english: Tender strips of chicken marinated with paprika, chilli, cumin and other spices.
sentences.chinese: 嫩鸡肉条，用红辣椒，干辣椒，孜然等香料腌制。

sentences.english: Ladle the soup into bowls, top with yogurt and sprinkle the reserved cumin seeds.
sentences.chinese: 入碗，勺上少许酸奶，洒上少许孜然粒食用。

sentences.english: Place cumin seeds in a dry sauté pan over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 把孜然粒放入煎锅，并开到中高火。

sentences.english: Crush a few cumin or fennel seeds and add.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎少数孜然或茴香种子和添加。

sentences.english: There was prominent difference in the germination indexes of cumin seed that had been stored for different time.
sentences.chinese: 不同贮藏年限的孜然芹种子各项发芽指标有显著差异。

sentences.english: We want to buy Cardamom, Chilli Powder, Cumin, Tamarind.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购豆蔻，辣椒粉，孜然，罗望子。

definition: to improve taste/to make sth palatable
